fields.name: ConfirmationHeading
fields.fieldText: You're all set! The cancellation succeeded.

fields.name: Error_Output_Message
fields.fieldText: When an order has items you can cancel, you'll find them here. Nothing to Cancel

fields.name: Cancellation
fields.fieldText: Sorry ,This is Special Order you Cannot Cancel

fields.name: PreviewChangesHeading
fields.fieldText: Review your selections. If everything looks good, you're ready to submit!

fields.name: ReasonsSelectionHeading
fields.fieldText: Select the quantity to cancel and the cancellation reason.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Invocable_Action_Message
textTemplates.text: Close this window and check the order summary page for updated information.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_NoItemsToCancel
textTemplates.text: When an order has items you can cancel, you'll find them here.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Unmanaged_Order
textTemplates.text: You can only run this flow on a managed order summary.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Unmanaged_Order_Title
textTemplates.text: The specified order summary is unmanaged.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Wrong_Entity
textTemplates.text: This is where you'd cancel items from an order. To cancel an order, start from the order summary page.

textTemplates.name: Error_Output_Wrong_Entity_Header
textTemplates.text: We don't think you meant to come here.
